channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: VC funding into Web3 start-ups down 82% year-over-year: Crunchbase
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Crunchbase noted that while it has been a bearish start for Web3 start-up funding in 2023, “venture funding is down in almost every sector.”

item.title: Former US Secret Service asst. director: Keep personal info of FTX users private
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Jeremy Sheridan claimed FTX users could become the targets of physical harm as well as attacks through online scams if their information was disclosed.

item.title: Ethereum is going to transform investing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alex O’Donnell
item.description: Expect to see tokenized securities proliferate in the years ahead — along with heavy investments in Ethereum staking pools.

item.title: Innovate some compliance mechanisms, US Treasury official tells DeFi community
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Assistant Treasury Secretary Elizabeth Rosenberg said the Treasury was enhancing its regulatory regime and that DeFi should program in some compliance.

item.title: Crypto Biz: EU looks under the hood of Big Tech algorithms, Musk’s TruthGPT and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz explores the fast-growing AI market, MicroStrategy’s integration with Bitcoin Lightning Network, and Microsoft's efforts to power AI development.

item.title: Dogecoin price limps below a key support after Dogeday turns into a sell-the-news event
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Dogeday turns into a “sell-the-hype” type event for DOGE after a SpaceX rocket test fails and Bitcoin price drops.

item.title: Lack of regulatory clarity on payment solutions could undermine US sanctions, says expert
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Anja Manuel said U.S. sanctions generally work with “responsible” blockchain firms but not when there are fintech solutions available to individuals looking to circumvent them.

item.title: 3AC founders’ OPNX exchange claims to be funded by AppWorks, SIG, MIAX Group
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: DeFi firm Nascent was also claimed as a backer, but it has clarified that it only bought FLEX tokens from the company’s previous incarnation.

item.title: NFT.NYC: Games and tokenization are driving NFT industry maturation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.category: Tokens carrot" at the end of that tunnel"
item.description: At NFT.NYC 2023, Cointelegraph’s team learned firsthand how nonfungible tokens are shaping the digital world of tomorrow.

item.title: Price analysis 4/21: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins have fallen below their respective support levels — a worrying sign that the bulls could be losing their grip.

item.title: Solana launches emissions dashboard to spur blockchain carbon footprint transparency
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The Solana Foundation has launched a real-time carbon emissions tracker to monitor the Solana blockchain.

item.title: Could Bitcoin be part of the $120T mutual fund industry?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains how Bitcoin could become a part of the $120-trillion mutual fund industry.

item.title: Spreading misinformation about Changpeng Zhao 'was the norm' for SBF, says Binance CSO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Binance chief strategy officer Patrick Hillmann claimed former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried was “constantly” using his platform to disparage CZ without considering the FTX Token sale.

item.title: The future of crypto taxes: Understanding the ever-changing landscape
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: Crypto taxation remains to be a controversial space, though some transparency is expected.

item.title: Warren Buffett was wrong about a ‘rat poison’ Bitcoin portfolio, data shows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Warren Buffett is not a big fan of Bitcoin, and this position has cost his investment portfolio at least a 320,000% potential gain.

item.title: How to stake Polygon (MATIC)
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Dilip Kumar Patairya
item.description: Staking MATIC helps one to generate passive income. Find how to stake MATIC via MetaMask, Binance, Coinbase Wallet and Trust Wallet.

item.title: Bitcoin Lightning Network is 1,000x cheaper than Visa and MasterCard: Data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Glassnode data demonstrates that the Lightning Network outcompetes traditional payment networks in terms of commission costs.

item.title: The game theory of Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: The game theory of Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies analyzes the behavior and strategies of participants in the market using concepts such as the prisoner’s dilemma.

item.title: Ukraine plans to adopt EU’s new cryptocurrency regulations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Immediately after passing the European Parliament, Ukrainian authorities announced plans to adopt the EU’s MiCA regulations on crypto assets.

item.title: $190B Ontario pension says no to crypto after FTX investment loss
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The pension fund had invested twice in the now-bankrupt crypto exchange, once during the peak of the bull run in 2021 and again in early 2022.

item.title: ‘Proof of reserves’ bill passes Texas House of Representatives
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Digital asset providers would be restricted from comingling customer funds with any other type of operational capital.

item.title: Bitcoin price fills CME futures gap but forecasts say $25K may be next
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin’s price risks more downside, with $28,000 now a key level to hold in order to avoid a return to the mid-$20,000s.

item.title: Gemini flags ‘big plans’ for Asia with India hub and regional CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The exchange reports its new Indian engineering hub will be second in size to its hub in the United States.

item.title: Michael Schumacher’s family to pursue legal action over AI interview
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The rapid development of AI is undoubtedly causing headaches for legislators and court systems globally as they struggle to deal with the technology.

item.title: Over half of Americans fear ‘major impact’ by AI on workers: Survey
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: More respondents said AI will “hurt” American workers more than it will “help” them over the next 20 years.

item.title: SEC’s ‘brute force’ crypto regulation attempt is ‘bad policy’ — Paradigm
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The venture capital firm pointed out the fundamental differences between crypto assets and securities.

item.title: Crypto firms alleged to have faked execs using AI and actors: Cali regulator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The regulator is cracking down on high-yield investment products saying the programs raise hype with the promise of high returns before going dark.

item.title: ‘Worst code I’ve ever seen’: Euro stablecoin faces centralization criticism
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Some pundits shared harsh sentiment toward a new euro-pegged stablecoin, but it’s not publicly accessible for the time being.

item.title: 3AC cooks up a storm, Bitcoin miner surges 360%, Bruce Lee NFTs dive: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: 3AC’s Kyle Davies becomes a connoisseur of white poultry, meanwhile SAI.TECH’s stock more than doubles on no news as Bruce Lee NFTs flunk.

item.title: ‘BitBoy Crypto’ intentionally misses court appearance to address alleged harassment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: YouTuber and Crypto Twitter personality Ben Armstrong openly mocked a federal judge’s authority, tweeting pictures of himself on a beach during an ordered court appearance.
